hero.headline: BarterNet — Trade Skills, Services, and More with Ease
hero.subheadline: Offer what you have, find what you need—AI connects you instantly.

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.description: BarterNet isn't just about skills—it's a marketplace for anything you can trade. List your expertise, rent out tools, or sell products. Need something? Let AI find it for you.

card1.title: Offer Anything
card1.description: Share your skills (e.g., coding), rent out items (e.g., a camera), or sell products (e.g., artwork).

card2.title: Find What You Need
card2.description: Search for skills, services, or products—AI matches you with the perfect fit.

card3.title: Flexible Exchange
card3.description: Pay with cash, barter with your skills, or offer something unique like equity.

examples.title: See BarterNet in Action
examples.description: Discover how our AI-powered platform connects people, projects, and products seamlessly. Here are real examples of how BarterNet works:

example1.title: Find a Service Provider
example1.userQuery: I need a backend developer who knows Node.js, MongoDB, and has experience building payment systems. Available to start next week for a 3-month project.
example1.systemResponse:
Found: Mikhail G.
Expert backend developer with 5 years of experience in Node.js and MongoDB. Has built 4 payment systems including integration with Stripe and PayPal. Available from Monday for remote work.

Skills matched: Node.js, MongoDB, Payment systems
Experience level: Senior (5+ years)
Availability: ✓ Matches your timeline

Would you like to connect with Mikhail?

example2.title: Describe a Project
example2.userQuery: I want to build an online marketplace for handmade crafts where artisans can sell directly to customers. The platform should handle payments, shipping, and allow customers to leave reviews.
example2.systemResponse:
Based on your project, you'll need:

1. Frontend Developer (React/UI expertise)
2. Backend Developer (API/database architecture)
3. Payment Systems Specialist
4. UI/UX Designer

Found 6 matching professionals who can form your project team. The AI has analyzed your project requirements and found specialists with marketplace and e-commerce experience.

Would you like to view the recommended team or adjust your project requirements?

example3.title: Find a Product
example3.userQuery: I need a high-quality audio system for my home office that won't disturb people in adjacent rooms. My budget is around $1000.

step1.title: Sign Up & List
step1.description: Create a free account and post what you offer—skills, services, or products—or what you need.

step2.title: AI Analyzes
step2.description: Our AI breaks down your project or request, identifying required skills, roles, or items.

step3.title: Get Matches
step3.description: AI finds the best matches from our community, suggesting fair compensation (cash, barter, etc.).

step4.title: Connect & Trade
step4.description: Chat with your matches and finalize the deal—simple and seamless.

feature1.title: AI-Powered Matching
feature1.description: Smart technology finds exactly what you need.

feature2.title: Flexible Compensation
feature2.description: Cash, barter, or creative trades—your choice.

feature3.title: Free to Start
feature3.description: Get 5 free credits to explore matches.

feature4.title: Global Community
feature4.description: Connect with people worldwide, in your language.
